messages.text: Hello? Hello?
Testing, testing…
If you can hear me, please respond!
Excellent! It appears to be working!
Excuse the short introduction.
My name is Riley. I can explain more in a moment, but first I need your zone number first.
Where are you at?
prompt location
Wait, really?
Are you absolutely sure?
No way, this can’t be real.
If you’re from 2015, who’s the President right now?
Believe me, I know that was a strange question.
I just...
I live in 2157.
I live in your future.
Let me look that up...
Oh my gosh! Oh my gosh!
It worked!
I live in the future. Plain and simple.
...Or more correctly, you live in the past.
I’ve been working on antiphone tech for the last five years.
(An antiphone is short for tachyonic antitelephone, in case you were wondering.)
And I may be the first person ever to send messages back through time!
We’ve just made history!
I can see the headlines now ‘Hacker sends message through time!’
Exactly. If we’re close enough I can text you.
But I can’t even do that very well right now.
*** Tachyonic sync disrupted. ***
*** Attempting tachyonic sync… ***
*** Timeline communication synchronized. ***
This is wiggin’ out, can you help a buddy out here?
prompt notifications
Well, I use the term lightly.
See, “hacking” refers to things like stealing bank access ID’s and biometric passes.
What I do is downright treason.
I got the sketches of the antiphone from the CIA.
Who knows what they were planning on using it for!

choices.text: You stole a time machine from the CIA?!

messages.text: You? well, I didn’t choose you for any particular reason.
You just happen to have the latest technology for your time.
More likely you are in the same location of space as I am, just in the past.
This antiphone communicates through time... Space: not so much.
If we get too far away from each other, we’ll probably lose connection.

choices.text: So we have to be near each other to text?
Why would you steal a time machine?

messages.text: First of all, ‘steal’ is a harsh word in 2157. It hurts my feelings!
Secondly, it’s not a “time machine”, it’s a time phone.
I can’t come visit you, but I can send messages to you.
And I can’t even do that very well right now.
*** Tachyonic sync disrupted. ***
*** Attempting tachyonic sync… ***
*** Timeline communication synchronized. ***
This is wiggin’ out, can you help a buddy out here?
prompt notifications
Move around a little bit
I need to calibrate our devices.
We can’t lose our connection
This might be our only shot..

choices.text: Only if you tell me what’s going on

messages.text: Yeah, your “location”. It’s called a zone.
You did know that, right?
Can you tell me what year it is?
This may be hard to hear so take a deep breath...
We don’t really know any history before 2100. Just bits and pieces
From what little information we were able to salvage, we know there were too many people on the planet.
Your time’s world leaders engaged in global resource wars.
Yes, they launched nukes at each other. And yes, everything is scorched for the most part.
But even more, each side also used different forms of biological warfare.
Must humanoids -err people, were genetically altered. Few by choice, almost all by force.
Now, most people... are not people. At least not physically.
Anoms are still just like you and me on the inside though. Thoughts, feelings, fears.

choices.text: Have you not heard of a history book?

messages.text: Oh, that’s what we call them.
Anoms is short for anomalies. The Despot mandates that all ‘normal’ human survivors call them that
He decided to label them with such a scientific term so it’s easier to treat them like lab rats.
He swears that they are nothing more than beasts that are lower than us in the food chain.
He thinks the less there are of them, the better we are off.
Which is why he insists we experiment on them for our own benefit.
He’s evil. He is the reason our world has gotten even worse!

choices.text: Tell me more about the Despot
So get rid of the Despot

messages.text: Of course I have…. there are none, smart-ass.
The Despot had all traces of human history and culture destroyed that he didn’t see as  “necessary” ...
He’s also why anoms (short for anomalies as he’s labeled them) are treated like lab rats and left to wither away.
He thinks the less there are of them, the better we are off.
Which is why he insists we murdering or experimenting on them for our own benefit.
He’s evil. He is the reason our world has gotten even worse!

choices.text: Tell me more about The Despot
So get rid of the Despot

messages.text: The Despot is the most powerful man on the planet (granted there’s not many of us left)
He’s really old, and one of the only survivors that has knowledge from the old world. I think he was a biologist or chemist or something.
He and his heavily armed gang control a tower - I think people from your time call it a skyscraper.
It is the only thing left that generates large-scale electricity and has a reserve of water.
That is how he is able to control all usable technology and keep us few survivors still alive.
In return, he expects us to scavenge or inject anoms with his chemicals.
He calls it a “necessary hardship”.

choices.text: So you make anoms more sick?

messages.text: Ha! I haven’t had a laugh like that in forever. No one can “get rid” of the Despot.
He is the most powerful man on the planet (granted there’s not many of us left)
He’s really old, and one of the only survivors that has knowledge from the old world. I think he was a biologist or chemist or something.
He and his gang control a tall structure - I think people from your time call it a skyscraper.
It is the only thing left that generates large-scale electricity and has a reserve of water.
That is how he is able to control all usable technology and keep us few survivors still alive.
In return, he expects us to scavenge or kill off anoms.

choices.text: So you make anoms more sick?

messages.text: They’re experimental antidotes for curing the anoms and the rest of us who will likely become anoms
We inject an anom and study him/her for a few weeks (I refuse to refer to them as “it”).
Then we submit our report to one of the Despot’s cronies for him to review.
They never work, and cause even more horrible defects to whoever is injected with them
Except...
Except for the last anom I injected.
Not by choice! He won’t provide power or water if I don’t.
They’re experimental antidotes for curing the anoms and the rest of us who will likely become anoms
We inject an anom and study him/her for a few weeks (I refuse to refer to them as “it”).
Then we submit our report to one of the Despot’s cronies for him to review.
They never work, and cause even more horrible defects to whoever is injected with them
Except...
Except for the last anom I injected.
The antidote is healing him. This is the first time in years an anom has responded positively.
I never sent my report for good reason.
Once the Despot finds out he produced a cure he’ll take out most anoms and save only those who he thinks is worthy.
He fails to realize we need to cure as many anoms as soon as possible to have any chance of saving humanity.
I’d tell others, but I only had a sample. The tools to make more of the right antidote is in the Despot’s tower.
I’m not sure if I can take a chance and just send my report...
Or try to get the rest of the antidote to heal everyone

choices.text: Get the rest of the antidote

messages.text: I was hoping you’d say that.
It’s just…
I can’t do this by myself.
There’s so many things that have to go right in order for to pull this off
I mean, I’m going up against a small army run by a mad scientist.
This might sound crazy, but I want you to help me get through to the tower.
I know you have no reason to just be there when I need some advice
But having someone to talk to when things get tricky will keep me sane.

choices.text: I don’t really have the time

messages.text: OK. I’ll send it in right now.
It usually takes about a day for the files to get processed.
Someone is at my door this is odd
I’m not expecting any visitors
Do you think I should I answer it?

choices.text: No, stay away from the windows and be quiet

messages.text: Strange. I’ve never seen these men before
I guess that they are here because I found the cure!
***Transmission Terminated***
Ok, I’m going to hide in the closet
The knocking won’t stop
It sounds like there are 2 of them at the door.
They know that I am in here
They keep telling me to open the door
I’m getting worried
The door hinges are rattling
They just broke down the door
They are in my house
I can’t breathe
One just stopped right outside of the closet
***Transmission Terminated***
Thank you! If we can get to the antidote you’ll have helped save everyone!
It’ll take a few days to trek to the tower. I’ve never been there.
I guess the best thing to do is round up some supplies.
It’s gonna get dark soon, though
Right now I can head out to scavenge for a few things.
But other scavengers tend to get weary if they haven’t found anything all day.
And let’s just say there can be a lot of cranky (and violent) folks out around sundown.
Or I gather what I have here at home and wait until morning to scavenge
It’s usually safer in the morning, but I’ve gotten lucky finding tools and stuff before sundown

choices.text: Stay in and wait till morning

messages.text: Oh, I see.
That’s alright, I’m sure I can figure it out
I guess I’ll just...go it alone
Alright, I’m going to take it easy for the rest of the evening
We have a big day ahead of us tomorrow
Oh what a night, I barely slept last night
I just kept thinking about this burden that I have
I think its just starting to register in my head
I’m going to head out to scavenge now
Should I stop by the old recycling center a few miles away, it’s in the wrong direction of the tower, but I’ve found some gems there in the past?
Or should I head straight towards the tower and see what I can pick up along the way?
That’s what I was thinking, though I’m a bit hesitant
Guess I’ll just have to be hyper aware as always.
I’ll be in touch. Hopefully I come across a lighter or a kitchen knife or something.
Hey you there?
Glad I took your advice cuz I got a good haul!
I found a thing that lets you see super far away. I think people from your time called them a telescope. Wait - no, they’re binoculars!
Also got that lighter I mentioned. I’ll be able to set up my camp fire much easier now
Whew, I’m beat. I think I need to get some rest
Though it would be wise to study the routes through the zones
If I don’t I might run into the Despot’s checkpoints. Which is where his armed guards are.
***Transmission Terminated***
Good call. I’m going to pack some food for the trip then I’ll head over; I’m kinda excited to see what I can find
I’m here, but the gate is locked.
I have to hop the fence to get in.
Should I hop it, or wait till the junkyard opens in an hour?
I’ll admit, I’m pretty nervous about heading out.
Really, this trip could mean the difference for millions of people...
...or it could be the last trip I ever make.
Either way, there’s no sense in wasting anymore time here.
I’ll get down to the transit and let you know when I’m on my way.
Ok, I’m on the transit. We’re en route to zone 4. ETA 40 minutes.
I really wish I had packed more food. My stomache has been bothering me since I woke up.
At least I’ve got some water (minus the water I spilt on the map)
I haven’t made a plan about getting through the next checkpoint though. By now someone will know I’m missing.
It’s risky to go around the checkpoint on foot. There might be biohazard stuff from the war lying around. Maybe even landmines.
On the other hand, if I stay here and the checkpoint security has heard I’m missing, they might take me in for questioning.
Which do you think is the safer bet?
That’s probably best, I’m exhausted.
I got more done than I thought today
I mean, I’m somehow communicating with someone in the past BEFORE the world fell apart
We’re planning to save what’s left of the human race.
And I found binoculars. Not bad, not bad at all.
We’ve got a big day ahead of us.
I’ll speak -err message you soon.
I’ve got some good news and not so good news.
The good news is I feel pretty good from last night’s rest and my stuff is all packed.
The not good news is I knocked water onto my map.
I must have done it in my sleep and it’s totally drenched.
Now all of the routes are totally unreadable
I know of a guy that has all sorts of maps. He usually only trades for water, though.
His shack is in the opposite direction of the tower so it’ll take about half a day to get back on track.
I can also just head in the general direction of the tower and hope for the best.
Ok, I’m pretty tired but I guess I can set a route now
I’ll update you in the morning
Uggh I’m completely exhausted.
I must have dozed off and spilled water on my map because it is completely drenched
Totally unreadable too.
The way I see it, I have two options
I know of a mapmaker that makes all sorts of, well, maps. He usually only trades for water, though.
His shack is in the opposite direction of the tower so it’ll take about half a day to get back on track.
Or I can just head in the general direction of the tower and hope for the best.
Ok I guess I’ll just sit out front.
Finally the junkyard master showed up!
Apparently there is now an entry fee of my half eaten sandwich, *sigh*
I probably should have just hopped the fence...

choices.text: Sorry, I was trying to help

messages.text: Ok I’m in.
Wasn’t pretty, but I made it.
Let’s just hope that this pays off
I see a few piles that look promising
Since we got here nice and early, there might be some hidden gems that haven’t been picked over yet.
Oh no
I hear barking
Its not the junkdog
Its not the junkdog
Its not the junkdog
ITS THE JUNKDOGG!!
Ok I’m game
I hope he doesn’t demand too much water.
I’ll need most if not all of what water I have to make the journey without collapsing from heat stroke.
It’s always incredibly hot and it doesn’t rain thanks to the bombs
Either way I need a map, so I’ll head out now.
Hey, they’re coming
Despot’s men- they’re are heading toward my zone.
And moving fast. I can see them riding through the valley in their patrol rigs
They weren’t supposed to come for another day or so
Oh no
This is bad
Sorry, it’s just that this could only mean that they’re looking for one of us
That is, one of us who tests the antidotes
I can’t help but assume they might be looking for me
I’m about a mile out.
My zone is only accessible through one path. That’s how I was able to catch them
Right now I’m up high on the hillside so they can’t see me… yet
I could try to make my way around them by staying on the hillside and ensure they don’t see me
But that would take a while. I would have to trek into the night.
Which isn’t safe.
I could also move closer to the road and be as stealthy as I can
But they might see me
Ok, I’ll keep moving along the hill.
It’s a bit slippery so I’m going to focus on not tumbling down to my demise
I slipped, and I think I broke my ankle.
It’s so painful
And a bunch of rocks tumbled down with me
I’m sure they saw something
I’m hiding behind a boulder. I know they’ll be coming up-
I can hear the rig
They’re coming toward me
what do I
***Transmission Terminated***
Ok. This is going to be tight timing wise
I have to get down there fast before they get too close
Then find some cover
Gotta run - I’ll reach out once I’m down there
I took a tumble and scraped my arm up pretty bad
Jeez this stings. Really hope it doesn’t get infected
But the good news is I’m down by the road and found some cover. Lots of rotting vehicles to hide behind too
They’ll be approaching any minute
What do you say I do from here?
Ok
Run
I think I can make it over the fence before he gets to me
Oh boy he’s close
Ahhh
Is that a rake?
Ouch...
***Transmission Terminated***
OK
We got this, we can do this
Focus here
I think this rake will make a decent weapon
I see the junkdog
He’s not happy
Oh snap
ASDFNESVNOACNOIGF
I did it
He’s dead

choices.text: Cut him up and keep his meat as food

messages.text: Yeah, its a good idea to collect as much food a possible
You never know where the next meal is going to come from
I can see a decent looking junk pile
It looks like there might be some hidden gems
I found two things that might be useful
There’s a baseball bat and a big metal shield thing
I can only carry one
What do you suggest?
Good call, that meat looks gross and we don’t have all the time in the world
I can see a decent looking junk pile
It looks like there might be some hidden gems
Give me a second to look around
I found two things that might be useful
There’s a baseball bat and a big metal shield thing
I can only carry one
What do you suggest?
I’m right with you. “Questioning” never really sounded like a great learning experience.
I’ll take the last exit before the zone checkpoint.
That way I can slip into the background and make my way into the zone on foot.
Wish me luck!
I’m finally of the transit. I’m probably half a mile away from the zone border.
I’m glad it’s still light out. Doing this at night would have been impossible.
Ok, It looks like it could deliver a decent smacking
If necessary of course...
I’m going to head to the tower now
I’ve been walking along the road for a while now. It’s quite miserably hot.
There’s a car coming towards me!
What a rare sight
Should I flag them down?
They say that the best offence is a good defence
I’m going to head to the tower now
I’ve been walking along the road for a while now. It’s quite miserably hot.
There’s a car coming towards me!
What a rare sight
Should I flag them down?
*sigh*
Here goes nothing
The car is stopping
I’ve never been in a car before
They say that they will take me to the tower!
Apparently they are headed in the same direction
Ouch
I think I jumped into the plants a bit too aggressively
I’ll wait here till they pass and are out of sight
Alright they are gone
Back to walking I guess
I could really use some water
Can’t walk any further
Too hot
***Transmission Terminated***
Alright
They say that it will be 2 hours until we get to the zone checkpoint
I’m going to have to figure something out because I don’t have the papers to get past the checkpoint
I’m just glad that I’m not walking in that heat anymore
Ok we are coming up on the checkpoint
Should I get out and try to sneak around the checkpoint on foot or should I hide in the trunk of the car?
This isn’t really the answer I was looking for, but I’ll give it a shot
I hope that you are right about this one
I’m crawling on the ground to avoid being see
I’m probably going to have to crawl for a while
I’ve got a ways to go here
Shhh
There is a guard right near me
Stay calm, stay calm
Wow that felt like forever
She’s gone
Should I turn back or keep going?
Good choice
We are headed through the checkpoint right now
We are stopped
Why haven’t we started moving?
Oh no I hear everyone getting out of the car
Oh snap the trunk just opened
***Transmission Terminated***
I like that idea. That way I don’t have to focus on being quiet while also wanting to yell out in pain from this scrape (it’s actually a huge cut, but who’s counting?)
Here they come...
Whew I think I’m in the clear
They’re continuing and don’t seem to have any idea I’m here
I guess I’ll keep moving along now
That mapmaker better be around
I think I’m coming up on the mapmaker’s shack
It’s really in the middle of nowhere. Not that my zone is anything to brag about
Come to think of it I don’t even know if this is a zone
Dang.
There’s no light on or any indication he’s here
Do you think I should knock or try to find a back door to sneak in?
Risky, but I guess I’ll do it
Ok, let’s do this
Crap, I tripped on some scrap metal or something. It made a ton of noise
I think they heard me
hiding behind car
2 scared 2 look if they’re coming
they’re coming
quick - what do I do??
Ok I’m under, just barely fit
There’s 3 of them. They definitely have guns.
It’s so hard to keep my breath silent
I’m terrified that they’ll find me
Keep your fingers crossed for
You there?
Hello Hello
Anyone come in?
Ok, I can do this
oh no
I’m breathing really loudly
I can’t control it, I’m so scared
what if they hear
***Transmission Terminated***
Surprisingly I’m not dead
They poked around for a but never looked under the car
Not sure what happened with my tachyon device either. It restarted or something
Whew, well now that we’re past that, I guess it’s on to the mapmaker.
He better have a map for me. This is gonna derail me even further now that I have to be extra careful.
They’ll surely be looking for me while I’m double-backing through my zone
By my estimates I should be there in about 4 hours.
Talk soon
I think I’m coming up on the mapmaker’s shack
It’s really in the middle of nowhere. Not that my zone is anything to brag about
Come to think of it I don’t even know if this is a zone
Dang.
There’s no light on or any indication he’s here
Do you think I should knock or try to find a back door to sneak in?
Ok good. Hopefully I can find the car and go back into the trunk. I didn’t like the thought of going alone
Wow I was lucky enough to find the car
They are next in line at the checkpoint
I have to hurry!!
Come on trunk, OPEN!
Yarrrr
Whew I made it into the trunk just in time
I never thought that I’d be happy to be in a stranger’s trunk
We are headed through the checkpoint right now
We are stopped
Why haven’t we started moving?
Oh no I hear everyone getting out of the car
Oh snap the trunk just opened
***Transmission Terminated***
Here goes nothing
I’m actually pretty close to the other side
All this crawling is going to hurt tomorrow
I shouldn’t have listened to you...
I think I made it
Luckily the tower isn’t too far from here
Well here we are: the gates to the tower
One step closer to saving the world
Now all I have to do it get in.
To be continued…..
There doesn’t seem to be anyone home
I mean, I knocked pretty loud
Maybe he’s out scavenging
I can try to check the back for an open window or door
Score! Found a cellar door that goes into the basement
Man it’s cluttered
Lots of mostly useless stuff
Ok, I’m up on the main floor
This is insane. He’s got a huge map of not only zones, but all these other places that I’ve never even heard of
“Canada” It sits above an even larger place called the “United States.”
Do you know what those names mean?

choices.text: Those are countries in my time

messages.text: Score! Found a cellar door that goes into the basement
Man it’s cluttered
Lots of mostly useless stuff
Ok, I’m up on the main floor
This is insane. He’s got a huge map of not only zones, but all these other places that I’ve never even heard of
“Canada” It sits above an even larger place called the “United States.”
Do you know what those names mean?

choices.text: Those are countries in my time

messages.text: Wow. He somehow knows what our civilization was like before the war
